text: Ben Qadir Abou Ouattara (born 25 December 1999) is a Burkinabé international footballer who plays for Vitória, on loan from Lille II, as a right winger. ==Career== He played for Salitas, Horoya AC and KV Mechelen. In January 2019 he moved on loan to Lille II for six months, with an option to buy. He made his international debut for Burkina Faso in 2018. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:Salimata et Taséré FC players Category:Horoya AC players Category:KV Mechelen players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Association football wingers Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Guinea Category:Expatriate footballers in Guinea Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Belgium Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Abou Ouattara
